channel.title: Moparscape - the best rsps community that is out there
channel.description:
At Rune serber i has just had my second flameout with numbers and Aj (They owned me the first time :( ) but this time i stated some VERY good points and i got banned.
I realized something - Rune serber has so many backstabbers and flamers that it's not even funny ( If you think mopar is bad... wow ) They FUCKING BANNED ME FOR USING ALL CAPS! They ban you for stating your opinion, at google you have no freedom, people there don't flame or troll or anything like they do here because they are so strict and scared of being banned. (Here it's not even bad; just having fun with other members) so i went and told Aj to suck my dick and said, 'MOPARSKAP!' thus getting banned.
Where mopar comes in; here people have just the right amount of freedom, you can talk to mods like normal people, not like gods.
So do you agree or disagree with what i said? post.

item.title: Moparscape - the best rsps community that is out there
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

zez1ma boy (+10/-71) Jamie1200 (+10/-54) 2 thnx for compliment nad dont call me moron - mscp In topic 07-12-2007, 02:16:44
ill never forget mine, classic![br][br][size=1]Posted on: 22-08-2009, 19:58:12[/size][hr][quote=“n33bz0rpl0x, post:25, topic:296517”][quote author=lesterknome link=topic=392511.msg2922374#msg2922374 date=1250827481]

We don’t have mod accounts hacked every week.

In my 2 years at moparscape[/quote]

Date Registered: January 04, 2008[/quote]
Good for you…whe ndo u plan on leaving?
It been along time soul HTF are you?

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape - the best rsps community that is out there
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

who cares? everyone knows kevin is a moron… It’s your own fault for going to the website in the first place…

This.

Not to mention rsps’s origin is Moparscape, but I love how r-s people say that its been there longer, and that they got more member’s.

First: their mods have to many ways to ban, etc… They can do it from infractions or they can just plain out ban… I got perm ip banned from there for saying making Aj a admin was their worse decision ever, and the reason people don’t come to Mopar is because the people at r-s come here and make bogus account’s, and thread’s just to make us look bad…

I say Mitb should fix the rep, make it so you cannot rep people for stupid crap, or make a admin, mod, or global mod check the reason, and post. That way Reputation will finally mean something again.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I got banned permanently for asking who a moderator was.
I got banned permanently again for saying “moparscape isn’t that bad”.
I got banned permanently again for asking why they think MoparScape is bad.
I got IP banned for saying “lol you took this from mscp” to a moderator.

item.title: Moparscape - the best rsps community that is out there
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:3, topic:296517”]Not to mention that our staff members our reliable and fair. Oh, and we don’t get our accounts hacked every other day and the forum’s pruned by hacked mods. That has happened 1 time in 3 years of this forum existing. It happens every week on their site.

Also, our administrators are not sell outs. We don’t sell a board on our forum to a server that rips it’s member’s off on a daily basis just so the owner, kevin, can make a huge profit. At least the cash that mitb makes from the sponsered servers is going to the advancement of runescape private servers.[/quote]
You reminded me that Rune-Servers Moderators are Getting Hacks quite alot.

Read full topic
